attributes.action: Refund 3rd semester of University for students to use as summer income.
attributes.additional_details: Because, since COVID-19, University students have not had access to University facilities or teaching and rely now on online module with no additional benefits but still need to pay for this semester’s tuition fee. I personally would find it beneficial to have the money given to students for summer funding as, like myself, have to still pay for rent, utilities and groceries whilst only receiving 80% furlough payment
attributes.background: Allow for students to pay off this money as originated once earning money from full-time work post University

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reimburse all students of this year’s fees due to strikes and COVID-19: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302855 

Require universities to reimburse students' tuition fees during strike action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300528 

Refund university rent and tuition fees due to coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304855 

Refund third term rent for students in private accommodation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319510

Refund university students for 3rd Semester Tuition 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306494 

Reimburse students on their year abroad who are affected by Coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302805

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
 
Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
